dmca.title: Adult Content DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
From: "[private]" < [private]@titanmedia.com>
Subject: RE: [#75046623] Fwd: DMCA Take Down Notice
Date: Wed, 27 Sep 2006 14:07:54 -0700

Google, Inc.
[private], Designated Agent 1[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

VIA E-Mail Only - [private]@google.com

Date: September 22, 2006

Re: Cease and Desist and Notice of DMCA Claim of Infringement -
Request for Removal of Images from your Webserver/s.

All of the above listed entities are hereby given notice valid under the
DMCA copyright infringement notification requirements, 17 U.S.C.512.

I am the designated agent of the owner of the copyrights of the images
and audio/visual works listed below. I believe that the images and
audio/visual works listed at the times cited below were used on the
website blogger.com in a manner that was not authorized by the owner of
the copyrights, its agent or the law.

The following urls were observed and documented on September 22, 2006:

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger2/3990/2856/1600/186138.jpg

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger2/3990/2856/320/186138_b.jpg

In addition the user links to an unauthorized copy of a movie owned by
Titan Media

http://rapidshare.de/files/33930110/DSR-pv.mpg and links to a
description of the movie which was created by and belongs to one of our
authorized distributors at
http://tlavideo.com/details/product_details.cfm?id=186138&sn=1&v=3.

This user is using his blog space for the sole purpose of distributing
unauthorized and illegal copies of adult movies. His actions are
willful and I suggest you cancel his account immediately!

We demand that upon receipt of this notification of claimed infringement
you expeditiously remove, or disable access to, the above claimed
infringing material and any other Titan Media property.

I certify under penalty of perjury that I have a good faith belief that
the information contained in this notification is accurate to the best
of my knowledge and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner
of the aforementioned copyright protected materials.

Please advise me when the offending images have been removed so that we
may re-inspect the site for compliance.

Sincerely,

/s/ [private]
[private]

General Counsel, Titan Media
